channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Drive Encryption (MDE)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Drive Encryption (MDE)

item.title: CVE-2021-23893|2024-08-03T19:14:09.452Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20drive%20encryption%20%28mde%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in a Windows system driver of McAfee Drive Encryption (DE) prior to 7.3.0 could allow a local non-admin user to gain elevated system privileges via exploiting an unutilized memory buffer.
